page.title: 06FURNESS MILL FARM
page.content: Mr. Basey keeps 37 dairy cows,13 beef stock,1 goose and 120 chickens & turkeys.They keep Friesian cows,which are fed on home produced barley,silage hay,dairy cake and grass.Mr.&Mrs.Basey get up at 6.00am to feed and milk the animals. They have 3 tractors,30 tractor implements and 1 combine harvester. Mr Basey has 99 acres of land.He grows winter and spring barley,silage and hay.On the farm they do not grow potatoes and turnips etc.The farm is mainly a dairy farm but they keep beef stock as well.They have 1 hayshed and a lean-to shed.Mr. Basey has lived there for 66 years.He and his family only have long weekend holidays because they can't leave the farm for long periods of time.
